name: FishGame (SpidurMelon)
description:
A cutesy fishing game where you try to catch the biggest fish!

If you're confused on what to do I recommend visiting an island biome (Yellow)

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D: Walking around (on the island)
  • E: Interact with squids (on the island)
  • Left Click: Sail
  • Right Click: Harpoon
  • M: Open full-screen map

If you want to delete your save delete the following file:
C:\Users\[USER_NAME]\AppData\Roaming\Godot\app_userdata\FishGame\savegame.save
